alert.note: Alert for Lauderdale (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued February 17 at 6:45AM CST until further notice by NWS Nashville
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Nashville has issued a Flood Advisory for the following rivers in Alabama...Tennessee... Shoal Creek Near Iron City affecting Lawrence and Lauderdale Counties. For the Shoal Creek...including Iron City...elevated river levels are forecast. ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM THIS MORNING UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...Shoal Creek Near Iron City. * WHEN...From this morning until further notice. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 5:30 AM CST Friday the stage was 9.8 feet and rising. - Forecast...The river is expected to continue rising during the next few hours. - Action stage is 10.0 feet. - Flood stage is 14.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued this evening at 645 PM CST.
